org.colomoto.biolqm.tool.simulation.updater

Class BaseUpdater

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.colomoto.biolqm.tool.simulation.updater.BaseUpdater
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LogicalModelUpdater
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractDeterministicUpdater, AbstractMultipleSuccessorUpdater, AbstractRandomUpdater

    public abstract class BaseUpdater
extends Object
implements LogicalModelUpdater
    Base class for all updaters.

    Aurelien Naldi

    • Method Detail

      • nodeChange

        protected int nodeChange(byte[] state,
                         int index)
        Test if a component is ready to change its state.
        Parameters:
        state - the base state
        index - the index of the component
        Returns:
        +1, or -1 for pending increase or decrease, 0 if it can not change state.

      • getModel

        public LogicalModel getModel()
        Specified by:
        getModel in interface LogicalModelUpdater

      • update

        protected byte[] update(byte[] state,
                        int idx,
                        int change,
                        byte[] next)
        Create or update the next state.
        Parameters:
        state - the base state
        idx - index of the position to update
        change - change for this position
        next - a previously created next state (null if it is still unchanged)
        Returns:
        an updated next state, cloned from the reference state if needed
